resources.string: Note: You must select the Company\'s Wi-Fi which you are going to use in future to mark your attendance.
Something went wrong please try again!
Please connect phone to the your company\'s WiFi
(Verify you identity and mark attendance by placing your fingetip on the scanner.)
Register at least one fingerprint in Settings
Attendance for today is already marked!
Your device does not support this feature.
Secure lock screen hasn\'t set up. \n Go to \'Settings -> Security -> Fingerprint\' to set up a fingerprint
